column1: I had a great day at work and met some new friends.
Today was just an average day  nothing special.
I enjoy going for morning walks to start my day fresh.
Cooking is my favorite way to relax in the evenings.
I feel guilty every time I eat something unhealthy.
No matter how much I eat  I never feel satisfied.
I skip meals on purpose to lose weight.
Looking in the mirror makes me anxious about my body.
I count every calorie obsessively  and it stresses me out.
I tried quitting  but I always go back to smoking.
I feel restless when I don't have access to alcohol.
Lately  my gambling habit is spiraling out of control.
I cannot focus on anything except when I get my next fix.
Drinking is the only thing that numbs my sadness.
I feel like my emotions are always all over the place.
I cry at the smallest things  and I don't know why.
I often get angry and regret it later.
Some days I just want to disappear from the world.
I dont know how to explain what I'm feeling.
I start a task but get distracted and forget about it.
I can never seem to sit still  no matter what.
I overthink every little thing I say to people.
My heart races before every social interaction.
I always feel like something bad is going to happen.
Even simple decisions make me feel overwhelmed.
I can't fall asleep because my mind won't stop racing.
I struggle to understand sarcasm or jokes.
I prefer routine and dislike sudden changes.
Social situations leave me completely drained.
I have intense interests that I talk about nonstop.
One moment I feel unstoppable  the next I crash.
I make impulsive decisions when I'm feeling high.
Some days I can't get out of bed  other days I don't sleep at all.
I get irritated over the smallest things.
My mood swings make relationships difficult.
I feel empty even when everything is going well.
Getting out of bed feels impossible some days.
I don't find joy in things I used to love.
It's hard to care about anything anymore.
I feel like a burden to everyone around me.
No one would notice if I disappeared.
I feel like I have no real friends.
Even in a crowded room
I haven't talked to anyone in days.
I wish I had someone to confide in.
Loud noises take me right back to that moment.
I have nightmares that make me wake up in terror.
I avoid places that remind me of what happened.
My mind replays my trauma when I least expect it.
I feel numb and disconnected from everything.
I hear voices that no one else hears.
I see things that others tell me aren't real.
People are watching me  I can feel it.
My thoughts are being controlled by something else.
I struggle to separate reality from my imagination.
I feel like there's no point in anything anymore.
I sometimes think about hurting myself.
The world would be better off without me.
I hear voices telling me to do dangerous things.
I have violent thoughts that scare me.
Oh well, it could have been worse
I sometimes stare at my room for hours
